verses.verse: But <WG1161> on the first <WG1520> day of the week, <WG4521> at early <WG901> dawn, <WG3722> they and some others came <WG2064> to <WG1909> the tomb, <WG3418> bringing <WG5342> the spices <WG759> which <WG3739> they had prepared. <WG2090>
